ACTIVE or CANCELLED| | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Flight Crew Need Vector Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. DH = DeadHead, AC = Active | | numberOfCrew | `'string'` | Number of needed crews | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra Information |
